languages.text: "Нет, Ваша Светлость, как и в остальном Империуме миры обходятся традиционным методом: нет заседаний, обвиняемым не дается слово, а казни происходят по одному лишь велению планетарных властей или влиятельных имперских организаций. Лишь на Даргонусе существует столь необычная церемония — Бенефас фон Валанциус был известен своей эксцентричностью. Говорят, он лично придумал сию систему и заложил славную традицию, участни{mf|ком|цей} которой вам предстоит стать сегодня".

traits.locale_text: "Нет, Ваша Светлость, как и в остальном Империуме миры обходятся традиционным методом: нет заседаний, обвиняемым не дается слово, а казни происходят по одному лишь велению планетарных властей или влиятельных имперских организаций. Лишь на Даргонусе существует столь необычная церемония — Бенефас фон Валанциус был известен своей эксцентричностью. Говорят, он лично придумал сию систему и заложил славную традицию, участни{mf|ком|цей} которой вам предстоит стать сегодня".

languages.text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As is the case with the rest of the Imperium, worlds make do with the traditional method: the accused are not allowed to say a word, and executions are carried out as ordered by planetary authorities or by powerful organisations of the Imperium. Only here on Dargonus does such an unusual ceremony exist — Benefaz von Valancius was known for his eccentricities. It is said that he invented this system himself and started this glorious tradition in which you are to take part today."

It is said that he invented this system himself and started this glorious tradition in which you are to take part today."

Only here on Dargonus does such an unusual ceremony exist — Benefaz von Valancius was known for his eccentricities. It is said that he invented this system himself and started this glorious tradition in which you are to take part today."

languages.text: "Hayır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparatorluk'un geri kalanında olduğu gibi dünyalar, geleneksel yöntemle iş görür. Sanığın tek kelime etmesine izin verilmez ve infazlar da genellikle gezegen yetkililerinin veya İmparatorluk'un güçlü kuruluşlarının buyurduğu şekilde gerçekleştirilir. Sadece Dargonus'ta alışılmışın dışında bir tören mevcuttur. Benefaz von Valancius, eksantriklikleriyle bilinirdi. Bu sistemi kendisinin ortaya koyduğu ve bugün sizlerin de teşrif edeceği bu görkemli geleneği başlattığı söylenir."
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As is the case with the rest of the Imperium, worlds make do with the traditional method: the accused are not allowed to say a word, and executions are carried out as ordered by planetary authorities or by powerful organisations of the Imperium. Only here on Dargonus does such an unusual ceremony exist — Benefaz von Valancius was known for his eccentricities. It is said that he invented this system himself and started this glorious tradition in which you are to take part today."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparatorluk'un geri kalanında olduğu gibi dünyalar, geleneksel yöntemle iş görür. Sanığın tek kelime etmesine izin verilmez ve infazlar da genellikle gezegen yetkililerinin veya İmparatorluk'un güçlü kuruluşlarının buyurduğu şekilde gerçekleştirilir. Sadece Dargonus'ta alışılmışın dışında bir tören mevcuttur. Benefaz von Valancius, eksantriklikleriyle bilinirdi. Bu sistemi kendisinin ortaya koyduğu ve bugün sizlerin de teşrif edeceği bu görkemli geleneği başlattığı söylenir."

languages.text: « Non, Votre Seigneurie. Comme c'est le cas dans le reste de l'Imperium, les mondes se contentent d'employer la méthode traditionnelle : les accusés n'ont pas le droit de prononcer le moindre mot et les exécutions sont effectuées sur ordre des autorités planétaires ou des puissantes organisations de l'Imperium. C'est uniquement sur Dargonus que l'on observe un cérémonial aussi inhabituel. Benefaz von Valancius était un personnage excentrique qui aurait inventé ce système lui-même et donné ainsi naissance à la glorieuse tradition à laquelle vous devez prendre part aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As is the case with the rest of the Imperium, worlds make do with the traditional method: the accused are not allowed to say a word, and executions are carried out as ordered by planetary authorities or by powerful organisations of the Imperium. Only here on Dargonus does such an unusual ceremony exist — Benefaz von Valancius was known for his eccentricities. It is said that he invented this system himself and started this glorious tradition in which you are to take part today."

traits.locale_text: « Non, Votre Seigneurie. Comme c'est le cas dans le reste de l'Imperium, les mondes se contentent d'employer la méthode traditionnelle : les accusés n'ont pas le droit de prononcer le moindre mot et les exécutions sont effectuées sur ordre des autorités planétaires ou des puissantes organisations de l'Imperium. C'est uniquement sur Dargonus que l'on observe un cérémonial aussi inhabituel. Benefaz von Valancius était un personnage excentrique qui aurait inventé ce système lui-même et donné ainsi naissance à la glorieuse tradition à laquelle vous devez prendre part aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: 「いいえ、閣下。帝国の他の領域と同様に、各惑星では伝統的な手法で対処しております。すなわち、被告に発言の機会は与えられず、惑星当局もしくは帝国の有力組織の命により処刑が執行されます。このような異例の儀式が存在するのは、ここダルゴナスだけです。ベネファズ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは奇行で知られており、彼自身がこの制度を発明し、あなたが本日参加なさるこの栄光ある伝統を始めたと伝えられています」
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As is the case with the rest of the Imperium, worlds make do with the traditional method: the accused are not allowed to say a word, and executions are carried out as ordered by planetary authorities or by powerful organisations of the Imperium. Only here on Dargonus does such an unusual ceremony exist — Benefaz von Valancius was known for his eccentricities. It is said that he invented this system himself and started this glorious tradition in which you are to take part today."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、閣下。帝国の他の領域と同様に、各惑星では伝統的な手法で対処しております。すなわち、被告に発言の機会は与えられず、惑星当局もしくは帝国の有力組織の命により処刑が執行されます。このような異例の儀式が存在するのは、ここダルゴナスだけです。ベネファズ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは奇行で知られており、彼自身がこの制度を発明し、あなたが本日参加なさるこの栄光ある伝統を始めたと伝えられています」

languages.text: “并非如此，大人。正如帝国其他区域一样，科罗努斯扩区的众多世界也依然采取传统方法进行审判——被告没有任何发言权，行星政府或帝国重要组织负责传达判决，执行行刑工作。只有达戈努斯才有这种不同寻常的仪式，毕竟，贝内法兹·冯·瓦兰修斯生前就是个特立独行的人。据说是他亲自制定了这样的制度，开创了王朝的光荣传统。而今天，您也需要遵循这伟大的传统。”
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As is the case with the rest of the Imperium, worlds make do with the traditional method: the accused are not allowed to say a word, and executions are carried out as ordered by planetary authorities or by powerful organisations of the Imperium. Only here on Dargonus does such an unusual ceremony exist — Benefaz von Valancius was known for his eccentricities. It is said that he invented this system himself and started this glorious tradition in which you are to take part today."

traits.locale_text: “并非如此，大人。正如帝国其他区域一样，科罗努斯扩区的众多世界也依然采取传统方法进行审判——被告没有任何发言权，行星政府或帝国重要组织负责传达判决，执行行刑工作。只有达戈努斯才有这种不同寻常的仪式，毕竟，贝内法兹·冯·瓦兰修斯生前就是个特立独行的人。据说是他亲自制定了这样的制度，开创了王朝的光荣传统。而今天，您也需要遵循这伟大的传统。”

languages.text: «No, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Como en el resto del Imperium, los otros mundos usan el método tradicional: no se permite a los acusados decir palabra y las ejecuciones se realizan por orden de las autoridades planetarias y las organizaciones importantes del Imperium. Solo en Dargonus existe esta singular ceremonia. Benefaz von Valancius era un excéntrico, y se le atribuye la invención de este sistema y de la gloriosa tradición en la que participará hoy».
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As is the case with the rest of the Imperium, worlds make do with the traditional method: the accused are not allowed to say a word, and executions are carried out as ordered by planetary authorities or by powerful organisations of the Imperium. Only here on Dargonus does such an unusual ceremony exist — Benefaz von Valancius was known for his eccentricities. It is said that he invented this system himself and started this glorious tradition in which you are to take part today."

traits.locale_text: «No, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Como en el resto del Imperium, los otros mundos usan el método tradicional: no se permite a los acusados decir palabra y las ejecuciones se realizan por orden de las autoridades planetarias y las organizaciones importantes del Imperium. Solo en Dargonus existe esta singular ceremonia. Benefaz von Valancius era un excéntrico, y se le atribuye la invención de este sistema y de la gloriosa tradición en la que participará hoy».

languages.text: "Nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wie auch im Rest des Imperiums verfahren Welten nach der traditionellen Methode. Die Angeklagten dürfen kein Wort sagen, und Exekutionen werden auf Geheiß planetarer Behören oder mächtiger Organisationen des Imperiums vollstreckt. Eine derart ungewöhnliche Zeremonie gibt es allein hier auf Dargonus ... Benefaz von Valancius war für seine Verschrobenheit bekannt. Es heißt, er habe dieses System selbst erfunden und diese ruhmreiche Tradition begründet, an der Ihr heute teilnehmen dürft."
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As is the case with the rest of the Imperium, worlds make do with the traditional method: the accused are not allowed to say a word, and executions are carried out as ordered by planetary authorities or by powerful organisations of the Imperium. Only here on Dargonus does such an unusual ceremony exist — Benefaz von Valancius was known for his eccentricities. It is said that he invented this system himself and started this glorious tradition in which you are to take part today."

Es heißt, er habe dieses System selbst erfunden und diese ruhmreiche Tradition begründet, an der Ihr heute teilnehmen dürft."
